mapper.update: update tb_userinfo set parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = version+1, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortNum = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_Enable = #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, is_Delete = #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateId = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, passWord = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_Male = #{is_Male,jdbcType=BIT}, phoneNum = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptId = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update tb_userinfo set is_Delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
